title: Video: Greywind – Car Spin
content:
Irish duo Greywind are pretty different to the usual style of music I cover on CitR, but they’re just so damn good, and definitely a throwback to my teenage years.

Car Spin, taken from their forthcoming debut album, Afterthoughts, released in October, is another perfectly composed, energetic slice of pop-punk, that’s sure to bring comparisons to the likes of Hey Monday and Paramore. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
